title: Tales of Haydon
description: Four loosely-interlinked high fantasy tales of mages, princes, kings, and mysterious maidens. Explore the hidden city; battle the Queen's Champion, Lady Sarita; meet shape-shifters; hunt a wild beast; and hear tales of regret from a King's boyhood. A King's Greatest Sin The Errand The Scar (excerpt from The Lion, Making of a King) The Hidden City Tales of Haydon is a short story collection, approximately six thousand words, appropriate for all ages. Watch for more from the Kingdom of Haydon, coming soon.
author: Tim Tash
